Summary: Caught my eye while walking, chrome color, seemed large and intelegently controlled
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking to my friend's house on a summer afternoon in the seventies when a chrome colored sphere very high in sky caught my eye by moving stragely for a baloon which is what I thought it was at first. I stopped and observed for about ten minutes until it ascended so high I could no longer see it.
trends: There have been 116 other sightings in Dallas
There were no other sightings in Dallas on or around July 16th 1977
